title: Linux端怎么样才能用win开不乱码
author: pengzi

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
pengzi 发表于 2019-10-13 11:54
我不想用ansi
打不出来符号啊
启动参数中加一个  -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 。

比如原本是 java -jar xxx.jar

现在是 java  -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -jar xxx.jar

replies.author: pengzi
replies.txt_content:
